title: Quick Start for Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform and ManageIQ
subtitle: Adding Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform (with Metrics Enabled) as a Container Provider

abstract.para: This document provides a quick guide for integrating Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform container services (with metrics enabled) with ManageIQ. It is intended as an abridged reference for users already familiar with ManageIQ, Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform, and Red Hat Enterprise Linux.
